section.title: registrar.default_expires
section.para: Contains number of second to expire if no expire hf or contact expire present.

section.title: registrar.default_expires_range
section.para: Percent from default_expires that will be used in generating the range for the expire interval.

section.title: registrar.min_expires
section.para: The minimum expires value of a Contact. Value 0 disables the checking. .

section.title: registrar.max_expires
section.para: The maximum expires value of a Contact. Value 0 disables the checking. .

section.title: registrar.max_contacts
section.para: The maximum number of Contacts for an AOR. Value 0 disables the checking. .

section.title: registrar.retry_after
section.para: If you want to add the Retry-After header field in 5xx replies, set this parameter to a value grater than zero.

section.title: registrar.case_sensitive
section.para: If set to 1 then AOR comparison will be case sensitive. Recommended and default is 0, case insensitive.

section.title: registrar.default_q
section.para: The parameter represents default q value for new contacts..

section.title: registrar.append_branches
section.para: If set to 1(default), lookup will put all contacts found in msg structure.

section.title: registrar.realm_pref
section.para: Realm prefix to be removed. Default is "".
